quote: Open your mind before your mouth. – Aristophanes
fact: In space, astronauts are unable to cry, because there is no gravity and the tears won`t flow.
joke: A ghost walks into a bar and asks for a glass of vodka but the bar tender says, “sorry we don’t serve spirits”
